wall_of_fame.title: The Wall of Fame
wall_of_fame.subtitle: Support the Development & Join the Credits
wall_of_fame.text1: I'm developing this project independently, and your support helps me improve the code and keep it free for everyone.
wall_of_fame.text2: As a token of my gratitude, everyone who supports me with a coffee will be featured in the "Special Thanks" section of my next project!
wall_of_fame.text3: Please include your name or a signature in your message so I can give you the credit you deserve. Your support is what makes future development possible.
wall_of_fame.text4: Your support empowers me to keep building and refining the tools you love.
